message:
[22-Apr-2025 11:47:16 UTC] >>> CREATE TABLE wp_likes_posts(
				users_ID BIGINT(20) UNSIGNED NOT NULL,
				post_ID BIGINT(20) UNSIGNED NOT NULL ,
				PRIMARY KEY (users_ID, post_ID),
				KEY key_users_ID_1 (users_ID ASC) ,
				KEY key_postID_1 (post_ID ASC),
				CONSTRAINT like_post_users_1
					FOREIGN KEY ( users_ID )
					REFERENCES wp_users (ID)
					ON DELETE NO ACTION
					ON UPDATE NO ACTION,
				CONSTRAINT like_post_post_1
					FOREIGN KEY ( post_ID )
					REFERENCES wp_posts (ID)
					ON DELETE NO ACTION
					ON UPDATE NO ACTION) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARACTER SET utf8mb4;

				CREATE TABLE wp_likes_comments(
				users_ID BIGINT(20) UNSIGNED NOT NULL,
				comment_ID BIGINT(20) UNSIGNED NOT NULL ,
				PRIMARY KEY (users_ID, comment_ID),
				KEY key_users_ID_1 (users_ID ASC) ,
				KEY key_commentID_1 (comment_ID ASC),
				CONSTRAINT like_comment_user_1
					FOREIGN KEY ( users_ID )
					REFERENCES wp_users (ID)
					ON DELETE NO ACTION
					ON UPDATE NO ACTION,
				CONSTRAINT like_comment_comment_1
					FOREIGN KEY ( comment_ID )
					REFERENCES wp_comments (comment_ID)
					ON DELETE NO ACTION
					ON UPDATE NO ACTION) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARACTER SET utf8mb4;
